titleStmt.title: Reply to Morris Eaves’ Review of The Dick and Jane
titleStmt.author: Aethelred Eldridge

publicationStmt.publisher: Department of English, University of Rochester

hi.hi: with intellectual spears & long winged arrows of thought

div1.p: In response to Morris Eaves’ review of The Dick and Jane by Abby Robinson, in last summer’s issue of Blake.

DEAR SIRS:
I LOVE TO PRAY. LOViNG TO
REHEARSE THE ART OF GETTING
NOTHiNG SPECiFiC IN RETURN
FOR THE FACE VALUE WHICH
THIS SWEAT PINS TO THE OUT
